msbt.message: Did you know there's a famous cook here for Turkey Day? Just imagine itâ€”being famous for COOKING!Hmm Does that mean the food he makes is famous too? I don't think I've ever eaten famous food before.
I've spent the whole morning making up all kinds of amazing Turkey Day smells to pretend to sniff.But pretty soon, I'll get to breathe ACTUAL smells, and most of the time those are even better, !

The Turkey Day feast is so close to starting, I can almost taste it. And it tastes almost sooo good!But now I'm worried the food I wanna make isn't gonna taste the same kind of almost good, .Hey, if you're not too busy chowing down in the plaza, can you come by my place for, uhmoral support?
